channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cannabis use may quadruple diabetes risk

item.title: Daily eye drops could make reading glasses obsolete

item.title: 1 in 8 Americans have already tried Ozempic and similar weight loss medications
item.description: GLP-1 drugs like Ozempic have transformed weight loss in the U.S., with nearly 12% of Americans having tried them, according to a new RAND report. Usa...

item.title: The sweetpotato’s DNA turned out stranger than anyone expected
item.description: Sweetpotato, a critical food crop for millions, has finally had its genetic code fully decoded after decades of mystery. Scientists unraveled its extr...

item.title: 150-million-year-old teeth expose dinosaurs’ secret diets
